WRITING.TITLE: TIFU by getting drunk and finding out that every dude in my class had a crush on a single girl
WRITING.TEXT:
This happened yesterday as we were on our way on a trip to Italy. As typical as it is our sixteen year old asses got drunk as fuck on the train.
It was three hours after peak, as we began talking. I kinda admitted that I'd had a crush on this girl for the past years.
Turns out, every guy in my class had one on her aswell...
We want to inform her about this hh...
Tl;dr got drunk on a train. Found out that everyone had the same crush

Aaah didn't know that, thanks. Anyway just found out that our school uses pirated versions of windows 7 ultimate. They're getting the Windows 10 update the legal way (illegally, because they pirated 7) though.
oops, ain't gon' edit that just TWELVEFORTY*
